Html:
i want to insert a logo to the qrcode
but seems this project cannot do it well
because insert a image to the center of the qrcode will dicrease the qrcode recongizeable.

Non of QRCode project can insert image without decrease recognize ability. That's what a lot of people's misunderstanding. It should never insert image.

If you want to insert image, you have to optimize it one by one. Image in QrCode is not part of ISO specification. We have ISO specification on front page.
